instruction: Have a more substantial breakfast to help with the absorption of amlodipine and reduce side effects.

coding.display: Medication action/side effects education, guidance, and counseling

attributes.comment: Have a more substantial breakfast to help with the absorption of amlodipine and reduce side effects.

instruction: The patient feels lightheaded mostly after taking amlodipine in the morning, sometimes only having a quick coffee for breakfast. The patient is concerned about feeling dizzy while working on scaffolding.

attributes.narrative: The patient feels lightheaded mostly after taking amlodipine in the morning, sometimes only having a quick coffee for breakfast. The patient is concerned about feeling dizzy while working on scaffolding.
